about_the_game:
A thrilling adventure beyond the stars! Join our intrepid pet astronauts on an exciting mission to rescue a planet on the brink of disaster.
Solve interactive puzzles by connecting cables and pipes to help Bit and Quantum repair the space station and fulfill their mission.
As you progress, you'll be able to restore the vitality of a greenhouse, breathe new life into the atmosphere, and become the catalyst for Earth's ecological rebirth. Are you ready to be the hero Earth needs?

The game features four unique stations, each serving a different purpose to help fix the Earth. As you advance, the puzzles increase in complexity, reflecting the rising challenges our heroes face.

Engaging Puzzles: Use your hands to solve puzzles, connect cables, water pipes and manipulate interactive elements.
Relaxing Gameplay: Enjoy a charming environment
Four Unique Stations: Explore diverse stations, each with its own set of puzzles and challenges designed to aid in Earth's restoration.
Character Interaction: Interact with Bit and Quantum, your faithful companions, by petting them
Rotating Stations: Utilize the unique 360° rotation feature to gain new perspectives and uncover hidden secrets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: OpenXR. Supports Oculus Touch, Valve Index, HTC Vive.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: OpenXR. Supports Oculus Touch, Valve Index, HTC Vive.

short_description: Bit & Quantum: Save the Earth is an interactive experience, following a pair of astronauts trying to find a way to help a planet in peril; Through hope and wit solutions can be found despite coming across unexpected challenges.
